stimulusHtml: The code segment is intended to compute the sum of all elements in all rows that have odd-numbered row indices. However, the code segment is not working as intended. Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  board  is a properly declared and initialized 2D array of  int  values.

 

int sum = 0;  
for (int r = 0; r < board.length; r++)         // Line 2 
{ 
   for (int c = 0; c < board[0].length; c++)   // Line 4 
   { 
      if (c % 2 != 0)                          // Line 6 
      { 
         sum += board[r][c];                   // Line 8 
      } 
   } 
}

choicesHtml: Changing line 2 to  for (int r = 0; r < board.length; r += 2)
Changing line 4 to  for (int c = 1; c < board[0].length; c += 2)
